Literature.Title: Nematicidal Cyclic Lipodepsipeptides and a Xanthocillin Derivative from a Phaeosphariaceous Fungus Parasitizing Eggs of the Plant Parasitic Nematode Heterodera filipjevi
Literature.Author: Helaly SE, Ashrafi S, Teponno RB, Bernecker S, Dababat AA, Maier W, Stadler M

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Schizosaccharomyces pombe DSM 70572(no activity data),Wickerhamomyces anomalus DSM 6766(no activity data),Mucor hiemalis DSM 2656(no activity data),Candida albicans DSM 1665(no activity data),Rhodoturula glutinis DSM 10134(no activity data),Micrococcus luteus DSM 1790(no activity data),Bacillus subtilis DSM 10(no activity data),Escherichia coli DSM 1116(no activity data),Staphylococcus aureus DSM 346(no activity data),Mycobacterium smegmatis ATCC 700084(no activity data),Chromobacterium violaceum DSM 30191(no activity data),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(no activity data),Human carcinoma HeLa-KB-3-1(IC50=28µM),Human prostate adenocarcinoma PC-3(IC50=24µM),Human lung carcinoma A549(IC50=33µM),Human breast adenocarcinoma MCF-7(IC50=25µM),Human ovarian adenocarcinoma SK-OV-3(IC50=33µM),Heterodera filipjevi(10-20% Killing=100µg/ml)
